mapper.update:
UPDATE `mqms_failure_track` SET
`voucher_code` = #{set.voucherCode},
`sao_id` = #{set.saoId},
`track_beginer_id` = #{set.trackBeginerId},
`track_beginer_no` = #{set.trackBeginerNo},
`track_beginer_name` = #{set.trackBeginerName},
`delivery_person_id` = #{set.deliveryPersonId},
`delivery_person_name` = #{set.deliveryPersonName},
`delivery_state` = #{set.deliveryState},
`delivery_deadline` = #{set.deliveryDeadline},
`delivery_received_date` = #{set.deliveryReceivedDate},
`delivery_code` = #{set.deliveryCode},
`car_test_symbol` = #{set.carTestSymbol},
`failure_reappear_person_id` = #{set.failureReappearPersonId},
`failure_reappear_person_name` = #{set.failureReappearPersonName},
`failure_reappear_symbol` = #{set.failureReappearSymbol},
`reload_date` = #{set.reloadDate},
`failure_reappear_date` = #{set.failureReappearDate},
`failure_reappear_situation` = #{set.failureReappearSituation},
`failure_reappear_result` = #{set.failureReappearResult},
`appearance` = #{set.appearance},
`analysis_departments` = #{set.analysisDepartments},
`analysis_deadline` = #{set.analysisDeadline},
`analysis_requirement` = #{set.analysisRequirement},
`appendix` = #{set.appendix},
`failure_track_id` in
#{item} and
`failure_track_id` >= #{where.failureTrackIdSt} and
`failure_track_id` <= #{where.failureTrackIdEd} and
`voucher_code` in
#{item} and
(
`Voucher_code` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Voucher_code` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`sao_id` in
#{item} and
`sao_id` >= #{where.saoIdSt} and
`sao_id` <= #{where.saoIdEd} and

`track_beginer_id` <= #{where.trackBeginerIdEd} and
`track_beginer_no` in
#{item} and
(
`Track_beginer_no` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Track_beginer_no` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`track_beginer_name` in
#{item} and
(
`Track_beginer_name` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(

) and

#{item} and
`delivery_person_id` >= #{where.deliveryPersonIdSt} and
`delivery_person_id` <= #{where.deliveryPersonIdEd} and
`delivery_person_name` in
#{item} and
(
`Delivery_person_name` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Delivery_person_name` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`delivery_state` in
#{item} and
(
`Delivery_state` like concat('%',#{item},'%')

(
`Delivery_state` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and

#{item} and
(
